price: 3. Dhulka soke ee hooseeya (Shaam iyo Falastiin), iyaguna, kaddib markii laga adkaaday3, way adkaan doonaan.
arabic: فِيٓ أَدۡنَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِبُونَ
footnotes: 3. Waxaa ka adkaaday Furus. Furus ama Peershiya waa magacii hore ee loo yiqiin Iiraan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fī adnā al-arḍi wahum min baʿdi ghalabihim sayaghlibūna
